casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Raymond Dakim Harris JOINER 514P13-6 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 16, 2017 Raymond Joiner, for Joiner, Raymond Dakim Harris. Ryan Frank Haigh, Special Deputy Attorney General, James R. O'Neill, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd of February 2017 by Defendant for Notice of Appeal:

"Motion Dismissed Ex Mero Motu by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of March 2017."
